channel.title: CVE Feed for Le-yan Co., Ltd. -- Personnel and Salary Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Le-yan Co., Ltd. -- Personnel and Salary Management System

item.title: CVE-2022-38116|2024-09-16T19:19:15.549Z -- le-yan%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- personnel%20and%20salary%20management%20system
item.description: Le-yan Personnel and Salary Management System has hard-coded database account and password within the website source code. An unauthenticated remote attacker can access, modify system data or disrupt service.
